Stratagems.title: Asurmen's Blessing
Stratagems.desc: Use this Tactic when you choose a Dire Avenger from your kill team to shoot in the Shooting phase. You can RR failed hit rolls for that model until the end of the phase.

Stratagems.title: Feigned Retreat
Stratagems.desc: Use this Tactic after a model from your kill team Falls Back. That model can still shoot this battle round.

Stratagems.title: Fire and Fade
Stratagems.desc: Use this Tactic after a model from your kill team shoots in the Shooting phase. The model can immediately make a normal move of up to 7"" as if it were the Movement phase.

Stratagems.title: Matchless Ability
Stratagems.desc: Use this Tactic in the Movement phase when a model from your kill team Advances. Add 6"" to the model's Move characteristic for that Movement phase instead of rolling a dice.

Stratagems.title: Phantasm
Stratagems.desc: Use this Tactic at the beginning of the first battle round. Pick a model from your kill team and set it up again, anywhere in your deployment zone.

Stratagems.title: Rune of Ynnead
Stratagems.desc: Use this Tactic when a model from your kill team is taken out of action. Roll a D6. On a 4+ that model suffers a flesh wound instead.
